class.name: franka_udrilling/TrainingMode
class.description: Switches to torque controller and allows the user to train the robot.

class.name: franka_udrilling/CartesianImpedanceController
class.description: A controller that renders a spring damper system in End-Effector frame. Orientation based on new orientation method.

class.name: franka_udrilling/CoManipulationMode
class.description: The robot switches to gravity compensation and allows the user to grabs and manipulates the robot.

class.name: franka_udrilling/uDrillingController
class.description: A controller for micro-drilling tasks based on a cartesian impedance controller with posture optimization. Compliance parameters and the equilibrium pose can be modified online.
